net.cnri.repository.search

Class BooleanClause

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.search.BooleanClause

  • public class BooleanClause
extends java.lang.Object
    A Boolean clause in a BooleanQuery. Modeled on the Lucene style of Boolean query. Comprises a subquery and an occurence marker, which is either MUST, SHOULD, or MUST_NOT.

    A BooleanQuery will match an object if and only if:

    • it matches every MUST subquery;
    • it matches at least one SHOULD subquery (or there is no such subquery); and
    • it matches no MUST_NOT subquery.
